Comment: Example payloads for initial_load execution mode

execution_type.initial_load: Processes multiple years sequentially (see years array). Each year completes Bronze → Silver → Gold before next year starts.
execution_type.manual: Process a single year specified in 'year' parameter. Used for ad-hoc re-processing.
execution_type.scheduled: Regular scheduled execution. Checks for updates and processes new data only.

notes.years: Array of years to process in sequential order. Years are processed one at a time with MaxConcurrency: 1.
notes.error_handling: If a year fails, the failure is logged to CloudWatch metrics and SNS, but processing continues with the next year.
notes.metrics: Year-by-year progress is published to CloudWatch via the publish_pipeline_metrics Lambda.
notes.summary: After all years are processed (or attempted), a summary notification is sent via SNS.
